Module ParenteVenturini
Package it.polimi.ingsw.ParenteVenturini.Network.Server

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ParenteVenturini.Network.Server.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
this class controls the conduct of the game

    • doMove

      public void doMove​(ClientController clientController, java.lang.String typeOfMove, java.lang.String nickname)
      the client requests to do a move, using a message, this method handle that message and send to the client the possible points for that move
      Parameters:
      clientController - teh client who requires
      typeOfMove - the type of the move (walk, build, specialBuild, endMove)
      nickname - the nickname of the player

    • doAction

      public void doAction​(ClientController clientController, Point x, java.lang.String nickname)
      after the client select the move using the doMove method, he send the point where he want to do the move, this method handle it
      Parameters:
      clientController - the client who asks to do the action
      x - the selected point
      nickname - the client nickname
